Back office
  • Home
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { TokenService } from 'src/app/services/token.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.scss'] }) export class NavbarComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private router: Router, private tokenService: TokenService) { } esta_logeado = false; ngOnInit(): void { if (this.tokenService.getToken()) { this.esta_logeado = true; } else{ this.esta_logeado = false; } } login(){ this.router.navigate(['/login']) } onLogout(): void { this.tokenService.logOut(); window.location.reload(); } }
